scripts.dev: concurrently --names "server,client" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.config: concurrently --names "server,client" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "cd server && npm i && cp .env.example .env" "cd client && npm i && cp .env.example .env"
